Hardware::Machine::name = network name
Hardware::Machine::memory = total amount of memory
Hardware::Machine::processors = number of processors
Hardware::Machine::frequency = maximum processor frequency
Hardware::Machine::stormThreads = maximum number of storm threads
Hardware::Machine::machineRole = If Machines role is set to manager, no ports should be used by the machine.
Hardware::machines = available machines for software execution
Hardware::managerReq = At least one manager should be assigned
Hardware::workerReq = At least one worker should be assigned
Hardware::duplicatePorts = At least one machine is using a port already used by another machine
